gw.xml

Class XmlSimpleValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.xml.XmlSimpleValue

  • public abstract class XmlSimpleValue
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an XML simple value, such as an xsd:int. Instances of this class know how to translate between Gosu representation (42), String representation ("42"), and know how to serialize themselves to the output XML, which may differ from the value returned by getStringValue(). For example, in the case of a QName, the Gosu representation would be a javax.xml.namespace.QName, the String representation would be the QName's namespace prefix and it's local part joined by a colon, yet when serialized to XML, the actual namespaces at the time of serialization would be taken into account, and a different prefix might be chosen.
